body.name: PRUVEEO Dash Cam, 1080P Front and Rear Dash Camera for Cars, Night Vision WDR, Dashcam with Rotatable Lens, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Parking Monitor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 mins
Or fastest pickup Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 mins
features: 【Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear】PRUVEEO L1-2CH dash cam front and rear in 1080p FHD resolution,Wide-angle front (170°) and waterproof rear（140°） cameras help eliminate the blind spots in your vision,providing reliable protection for your safe driving.

【Rotate the Lensand Super Night Vision 】This dash camera adopts a unique rotating design, you can rotate the lens to adjust the viewing angle you want.F1.8 aperture and a Starvis sensor, making it easy to obtain sharp, color-accurate images.Eliminates the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments, making it easy to obtain sharp, color-accurate images.

【G-sensor and Loop Recording】 The camera has built-in G-sensor, when the camera detects a collision or vibration, it will automatically lock the video being recorded,locked video will not be overwritten by loop recording. After inserting a MicroSD card, the dash cam will automatically start/ stop recording when the car is on/off. If the video is not needed after the card is full, just delete or format it manually to re-record.

【24/7 Parking Monitor】When the car engine and camera are both off, if the parking guard is on, the camera will automatically start recording when it detects vibration and collision, lock a video, and then automatically shut down. If a dash and cabin cam is required to protect your vehicle 24/7, an additional hardware kit needs to be installed.

【Easy installation】This dash cam easy to install.Use 3M sticker stand, with the included electrostatic sticker, you can stick it anywhere you want without leaving any smudges. We offer 7*24 hours of technical support. If you have any queries, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PRUVEEO L1-2CH Dash Cam PRUVEEO L1-2CH dash cam frontand rear adopts a unique rotating design, you can rotate the lens to adjust the viewing angle you want.F1.8 aperture and a Starvis sensor, making it easy to obtain sharp, color-accurate images.Eliminates the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments, making it easy to obtain sharp, color-accurate images.24H Parking Monitor - You need to purchase an ACC hardwire kit (search for B09SCPM4C4) with low battery voltage detection to leave it running when parked (not included).The dash cam works automatically. It starts recording when the engine is turned on and stops when it is turned off.The memory card is NOT included in the packaging. Max Supports a 128 GB Micro SD Card.class 10 or above. Please format the memory card on computer and on dash cam first before recording.The function of built in 150mAh battery is just for emergency recording and save settings. Please keep the dashcam plugged in always, the dual dash cam will shut down after 5 seconds when there is no external power connection.The dashcams covers the functions what you need for daily driving. It's a decent gift for family and friend.

New Model:J20-4CH 12'' Mirror Dash Cam,4 Channel Camera FHD 1080Px4, Front, Left, Right and Rear,please search for ASIN B0BY7TCZJ3.New Model:J30 3 Channel Mirror Dash Cam, 1440P+1080P+1080P Front Inside and Rear,please search for ASINB0BL32YWTG .New Model:J12 9.66 inch Mirror Dash Cam,please search for ASIN B0BY918JM5.New Model: Baby Monitor ,please search for ASINB0BXPG8GWT .New Model: J40 Smart BSD ADAS Dual Mirror Dash CAM,please search for ASIN B0BM8QHRDT .New Model: L2-2CH Dual Channel 1080P dash cam front and rear,please search for ASIN B0BYSNCHX5.New Model: L1-2CH Dual Channel 1080P dash cam front and rear,please search for ASIN B0BYSNF1PR.New Model: D90-4CH 4 Channel Camera FHD 1080Px4, Front, Left, Right and Rear ,please search for ASIN B0BJZQ37G7. Specification : · Screen : 3 inch LCD Display· Lens Sensor: Sony Sensor· Lens Angle: 170° Wide· Lens Aperture: F1.8 aperture· Video format: AVI· G-Sensor Lock : Supported· Internal Power: Built-in Li-ion Battery· External power supply : DC 5V/1.5A· Operating Temperature:14°F（-10°C）～170°F（75°C）· Storage : Micro SD Card 32GB-128GB (NOT included) What's in the Box? 1 x L1-2CH Dash Cam1 x Rear Camera1 x Car Charger1 x User ManualOther necessary accessories

Rotatable camera The front lens of the dash cam adopts a unique rotating design. After sticking 3M adhesive to the car window, you can adjust the desired viewing angle by rotating the lens up, down, left, and right to achieve the best recording effect. Dual Dash Cam Front and Rear Wide-angle front (170°) and waterproof rear（140°） cameras help eliminate the blind spots in your vision,providing reliable protection for your safe driving. Superior Night Vision Pruveeo dash cam captures every vivid moments such as license plates and road signs clearly even at night. F/1.8 largest aperture available , 6-glass wide angle lens and high sensitivity image sensor ensure better image quality and more natural details when driving at night. Loop Recording Loop Recording creates video clips, and the front and rear dash cam will automatically overwrite the oldest file to save the current file. Infinite loop recording never misses any moment. You can choose the size of each file as 1minutes, 3 minutes, or 5 minutes.

Auxiliary parking This dash cameras display screen will automatically show full rear view with parking guide lines when the car reverse gear is engaged. (If you need dash cam reverse assistance function, the RED cable need connected to the positive pole of reversing lamp.) Parking Monitor Its used to protect your car after parking. With this function on, after the camera powering off. When camera detects shock and collision, it will automatically turn on and start recording video, then the lock video file safely. The parking Monitor mode provides your car with 24-hour protection. If you want to use the parking monitoring feature, please purchase the Pruveeo ACC hardwire kit with low-voltage protection feature.ASIN B09SCPM4C4,ASIN B07B9ZQJ3R. Built-in G-sensor When the G-sensor detects a collision, the current video is locked, ensuring important footage is kept protected. The locked video files cannot be erased during Loop Recording, they remain on the memory card until the card is reformatted. We recommend using the Low setting for this feature. Waterproof Rear Camera The rear camera can be mounted in the cabin or above the license plate outside. Comes with the backup camera function by connecting the signal cable to the power supply of the reversing lights.
